name: Dark statuspage.io Dashboard
description: A simple dark mode to the manage.statuspage.io dashboard. Manage your components with no more eye strain! (Made by a dark mode loving game developer)

user.name: Michael Cox
user.about: Just your friendly neighbourhood game developer making dark themes for websites that don't seem to like people who stare at screens all day. Don't mind me.

additional_info:
Version 1.1. Written by Michael Cox. 

Simple and automatic. Changes all background colours to dark greys and blacks and sets all body text to white. 

Works on manage.statuspage.io pages. Does not affect your status page.

1.1

- Fixed the maintenance scheduling page where some text and icons appeared white while on white backgrounds.
